mapper.select: select * from ycyscore where ip = #{value} and to_days(todaytime) = to_days(now())
select * from ycyscore where todayscore is not null and to_days(todaytime) = to_days(now()) order by todayscore desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rank, t.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( select * from ycyscore where todayscore is not null and to_days(todaytime) = to_days(now()) order by todayscore desc ) AS t ) f WHERE f.ip = #{ip}
select * from ycyscore order by score desc,updatetime asc
select * from ycyscoretotal order by score desc,updatetime asc
select * from ycyscore where todayscore>=100 and to_days(todaytime) = to_days(now()) and mintime is not null order by mintime asc
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rank, t.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM ycyscore ORDER BY score DESC, updatetime asc ) AS t ) f WHERE f.ip = #{ip}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rank, t.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM ycyscoretotal ORDER BY score DESC, updatetime asc ) AS t ) f WHERE f.ip = #{ip}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rank, t.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM ycyscore WHERE score >= 100 AND TO_DAYS(todaytime) = TO_DAYS(now()) and mintime is not null ORDER BY mintime ASC ) AS t ) f WHERE f.ip = #{ip}
mapper.insert: insert into ycyscore ( `city`, `ip`, `name`, `score`, `wxname`, `createtime`, `updatetime`, `todaytime`, `mintime`, `todayscore`, `times` ) values ( #{city}, #{ip}, #{name}, #{score}, #{wxname}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{mintime}, #{todayscore}, 1 )
insert into ycyscoretotal ( `ip`, `city`, `score`, `createtime`, `updatetime` ) values ( #{ip}, #{city}, #{score}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
